title: Engineering Senior Manager
highlights: Led a complex portfolio combining project, programme, and team leadership responsibilities.
Directed the successful migration of a legacy SAP system to Google Cloud Platform (GCP) as a discrete project.

Oversaw the bank-wide IBM Planning Analytics replatforming and upgrade to OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) as part of a larger programme, leading the Planning Analytics team to deliver strategic builds and deployments.
On a day-to-day basis, managed a Data team responsible for developing a core database and delivering Bank of England regulatory reporting.

Delivered over 30% operational cost savings through cloud migrations, streamlined Agile practices, enhanced site reliability by centralising processes, and managed a £6M+ budget across regulatory, insurance, and forecasting initiatives.
Mentored colleagues in technical skills and leadership development.
